data.title: AI Teaching Assistant
data.meta_description: AI to help teachers give instant, personalized feedback on written assignments. Engaged practice for students, time savings and insights for teachers. Use built-in assignments or add your own. Supported subjects include Social Studies, English, Science, and World Languages.
data.text:
1

Add assignments

Use built-in assignments from our assignment library or add your own. Customize how the AI gives feedback.

Class Companion is free for teachers and students. The paid school or district plan includes LMSÂ integration (e.g. assignment and grade syncing with Schoology and Canvas), AIÂ / plagiarism detection, and more!

You can download the Data Privacy Packet to forward to your IT Director. This includes the Data Privacy Agreement. You can also email privacy@classcompanion.com with questions.

You can use Class Companion for any subject with written assignments. This includes, but isnât limited to, English, Social Studies, Science, and World Languages.

Yes, on the free plan, Class Companion shows teachers text that students have pasted into their response and how much time the student spent typing the response. We offer additional AIÂ detection in our paid school or district plans.

No. We do not sell your or your studentsâ data, and we do not advertise. Your privacy is our priority. See our Privacy Policy for details.
